messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: 'Following an anonymous tip, Sgt. Ethan Brown and Detective Emily Frost started surveillance on a suspected 112 CRIME: 07:20 IDENTIFICATION NUMBER 84900 - CONFIRME drug house. Officer Luke Harper was STATIONED nearby to monitor traffic in and out of the residence. Technician Julia Clarke was brought in to handle wiretaps and other electronic surveillance. After two weeks, enough evidence was gathered, and Lt. Mia Thompson gave the go-ahead for a raid. Leading the charge was Captain Oliver Knight, along with Patrol Officer Zoe Adams. Inside the house, Officer Sam Porter discovered a hidden compartment under the kitchen, which was examined by Criminalist Chloe Wright for any traces of narcotics. After the operation, all findings were handed over to Detective Jason Gray for further investigation.'
